name: Angular-BeastCode
displayName: Angular 8 Snippets - TypeScript, Html, Angular Material, ngRx, RxJS & Flex Layout
description: 240 Angular Snippets (TypeScript, Html, Angular Material, Flex Layout, ngRx, RxJS, PWA & Testing) Updated for v8 Beta

scripts.build: npm run build_snippets; npm run build_readme; npm run dups; npm run count; npm run countTS; npm run countHTML; npm run countJS; npm run countJson
scripts.build_snippets: npm run build_html; npm run build_typescript; npm run build_javascript; npm run build_json
scripts.build_readme: cat src/README_top.md > README.md; npm run generate_readme_table; cat src/README_bottom.md >> README.md;
scripts.generate_readme_table: cat src/snippets.json | grep 'prefix\|description' | sed -e "s/description//" | sed -e "s/prefix//" | sed -e 's/    "": "//' | sed -e 's/",//' | sed -e 'N;s/\n/ | /' | sed -e 's/$/ |/g' | sed -e 's/^/| /' | sort  >> README.md
scripts.dups: npm run dup_snippet; npm run dup_name
